summary: The diff implements most requirements for PhonePe QR code payment integration. REQ-27 (QR code display), REQ-28 (storing phone number), and REQ-30 (payment confirmation with phone number) are fully implemented. REQ-29 (payment instructions) is partially implemented but missing explicit mentions of Google Pay and Paytm as compatible payment apps, though it includes PhonePe and step-by-step instructions.

missing_requirements.requirement: Instructions must mention PhonePe, Google Pay, and Paytm as compatible payment apps
missing_requirements.reason: The SubscriptionPage.tsx shows payment instructions with PhonePe QR code, but the visible truncated content does not explicitly mention Google Pay and Paytm alongside PhonePe in the instructions

missing_requirements.requirement: Display the PhonePe QR code image file (phonepe-qr-code.dim_400x400.png) as a static asset
missing_requirements.reason: The SubscriptionPage.tsx references QR code display components but the actual image file (phonepe-qr-code.dim_400x400.png) is not shown in the added files list, and no evidence of the image being imported or rendered from static assets
